Description:
Account Manager AfricanOur client is a 20-year-leading multinational Forex Trading Company headquartered in the UAE. They are looking for experienced Account Managers with a background in banking or Forex within the fintech industry.You can keep and expand your customer base by offering individualized service and access to the information consumers need.
Deliver a superior customer experience and serve as our high-net-worth clients' point of contact, fixing any problems and providing support throughout their interaction with us.
Make sure to achieve your own KPIs (net deposits, traded clients, call time, etc.); increase production, profitability, and the quality and experience of client service; respond to emails, helping with trades, withdrawals, and customer training; cooperate with pertinent departments to quickly address problems and concerns; give them accurate information on the company's goods and services; preparing and delivering a regular financial market update; daily, weekly, and monthly updates to customer portfolio reports; keep up-to-date on all that the organization has to offer;Skills
Skills: • Has excellent English communication skills. Any more languages are viewed as beneficial.
• At least two years of sales-related work experience, preferably in the financial industry:
• Working with clients from Sub-Saharan Africa:
• A university degree or its equivalent in a related discipline (such as business, finance, or economics)
• The capacity to collaborate with stakeholders effectively
• The ability to manage multiple tasks and track and report on progress
• The self-motivation to work independently in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment
• Ability to collaborate, interact, and communicate with members of various teams and departments
• Working with CM experience is regarded as advantageous
